text: first of all Ken I wonder if you can

drove cooked did all the normal things
that people do and then I was diagnosed
with motor neurone disease and little by
little I lost the use of my legs my
hands don't grip my body starts to curl
up and effectively from being an
independent person I became a person
who's completely dependent on other

little the living stopped working so you
know you can do things but you can't and
you have to all the time be working out
how can I get from this place to that
how do I transfer from a seat to a
toilet simple things like that how do I
get a fork to my mouth so it's a
constant process of trying to use your
brain to work out what you can do
